title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare – Remastered + Update 2
body:
Call of Duty: Modern Warfare – Remastered + Update 2


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: Raven Software, Infinity Ward, Activision
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 58.1 GB
Repack Size: from 26.4 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent [magnet] [.torrent file only] (MULTI10)
  • RuTor [magnet] (RUS/ENG)
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] (RUS/ENG)
  • FreeTorrents (RUS/ENG)
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) (MULTI10)
  • Filehoster: 4 hosters, Main Files + Filehoster: 4 hosters, Lang + MP Files(Uploaded by Susch, interchangeable, NOT compatible with MultiUpload mirrors) (MULTI10)
  • Filehoster: 1fichier (Uploaded by Marty McFly, NOT compatible with MultiUpload mirrors)

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Call.of.Duty.Modern.Warfare.Remastered-CODEX ISO release: codex-call.of.duty.modern.warfare.remastered.iso (44,984,532,992 bytes)
  • Missing localizations (8.7 GB) and multiplayer support files (7.5 GB) added
  • Update 2 installed over, alternative 3DM crack located in NoDVD folder after installation
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (but video files, see below)
  • Multilanguage audiotracks in some game videos were removed & then are losslessly installing on user’s machine based on user’s language selection. So, technically game videos aren’t MD5 perfect, but both video & audio for every language are untouched. Just no multitracks, so you can install & play one language at a time.
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading of unnecessary language files, multiplayer files and redundant videos (animated menu backgrounds, CoD MW original intro and attract movie), saving you some bandwidth
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 58.1 to 26.4~32.8 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 1.5-3 hours (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 42~50 GB (~70 GB during installation)
  • Repack by FitGirl
  • Many thanks to Spider91 from RG Mechanics for providing decompression tools and Fisher, Timo654, x.X.RIDDICK.X.x and UberPsyX from cs.rin.ru community for providing language packs and updates

Game Description

One of the most critically-acclaimed games in history. Call of Duty®4: Modern Warfare®, is back, remastered in true high-definition, featuring enhanced textures, rendering, high-dynamic range lighting, and much more to bring a new generation experience to fans.

You can skip downloading of files you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • setup-fitgirl-selective-eng-bra-pol-jap-kor.bin (one archive for five languages, English-only dubbing available)
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-french.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-italian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-russian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-spanish.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-multiplayer-files.bin (optional multiplayer files, MP doesn’w work at the moment of repack release)
  • setup-fitgirl-optional-original-videos-addon.bin (animated menu backgrounds, CoD MW original intro and attract movie)

In example, if you want to launch the game with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers but without MP and redundant videos –
skip all “selective” and “optional” files, but download setup-fitgirl-selective-spanish.bin & all main files (01-07).
